description.raw:
issue #1811

Currently you can spawn multiple camera sensors with same name but the problem occurs during the removal process, in which the wrong rendering camera gets removed. The scene just removes the first camera in the list that matches the name so it may not be the correct one.

thanks to @ElteHupkes for the suggested fix. I also updated other parts in gazebo that rely on the rendering camera name so they continue to work correctly. The important change is that a camera sensor now creates a rendering camera with a scoped name instead of its leaf name.

jenkins [nv gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/29/) - ok

thanks to @ElteHupkes for the suggested fix. I also updated other parts in gazebo that rely on the rendering camera name so they continue to work correctly. The important change is that a camera sensor now creates a rendering camera with a scoped name instead of its leaf name.

jenkins nv gpu - ok
